pages.text: Runed wood is crafted using a $(l:crafting/knife)knife$() in one hand and $(l:herbs/wildroot)wildroot$() in the other. Simply right-click the relevant log with the knife and it will be transformed.$(br2)Such runed wood is used to top $(l:rituals/standing_stones)runed pillars$() required for some rituals.$(br2)$(info) The wildroot is consumed in the process.
